name: 2D Shooter (xXVoltarXx)
description:
Made for a MSU class

This is a top down game where you complete levels and shoot enemies.

My proposed modifications are:

More levels that increase in complexity and size

A final boss that has a custom sprite and possibly custom attacks (if I can't do custom attacks, I'll just reuse an enemy)

New enemies

Assets Provided by Brian Winn
